sys_ux_client_script.name: Form screen status changed

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_18089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbe0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Sales Order Case">9c0892c11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb5f</macroponent><name>Form screen status changed</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const {title, tooltipPreview, primaryItem, secondaryItems, hasUpdate, isDirty, status, screenParams} = event.payload;
    api.emit("SCREEN_STATUS_CHANGED", {
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams: screenParams ? { table: screenParams.table, sysId: screenParams.sys_id }: null
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 18:25:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>18089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbe0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Form screen status changed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_18089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbe0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 18:25:57</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
